meanings.sent1: She mispenned the word on her test and got it wrong.
meanings.sent2: He often mispenned his friend's name in emails.
meanings.sent3: The teacher mispenned 'banana' as 'bananana' on the board.
meanings.sent4: Her mispenned address led the delivery person to the wrong house.
meanings.sent5: The mispenned sign caused confusion for the visitors.

meanings.sent1: The mispenned letter had many errors that needed correction.
meanings.sent2: He received a mispenned invitation with his name misspelled.
meanings.sent3: The mispenned note made everyone laugh at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her mispenned essay was a colorful mess of words.
meanings.sent5: The mispenned label on the package caused delays in delivery.
